ing: 2 (8 ounce) packages PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1/2 cup KRAFT THICK 'N SPICY Original Barbecue Sauce
1 (2.52 ounce) package OSCAR MAYER Fully Cooked Bacon, chopped
des: "There's a new player at your football party, and it's got game. This creamy, spicy, cheesy dip-with bacon, no less-will give you a clear home-field advantage."
ins:
Spread cream cheese onto platter.
Drizzle with barbecue sauce.
Top with remaining ingredients.
